config.option.brntalk.use_vanilla_style_: Use Vanilla Style GUI and Background
If set to true, the custom GUI and background will be replaced by the standard vanilla dark background.
config.option.brntalk.char_delay.tooltip: Lower value means faster typing speed. Set to 0 to display immediately.
config.option.brntalk.msg_pause.tooltip: Pause Time between continuous messages. Set to 0 to disable pausing.
config.option.brntalk.smooth_factor.tool: Smooth factor of scrolling. Lower value means smoother scrolling.
config.option.brntalk.openButtonX: X position of the 'Open Screen' button (pixel)
config.option.brntalk.openButtonX.toolti: The distance between button and the left edge of screen. This won't work if you have installed FTB Library.
config.option.brntalk.openButtonY: Y position of the 'Open Screen' button (pixel)
config.option.brntalk.openButtonY.toolti: The distance between button and the top edge of screen. This won't work if you have installed FTB Library.
